memberdef.argsstring: (real *c, real *f, int n_x, int n_y, int n_z, int bc_x, int bc_y, int bc_z, real x_min, real x_max, real y_min, real y_max, real z_min, real z_max)
memberdef.name: interp3Dexpl_init_coeff

briefdescription.para: Calculate tricubic spline interpolation coefficients for 3D data.

detaileddescription.para: This function calculates the tricubic spline interpolation coefficients for the given data and stores them in an array. Explicit cofficients are calculated.

parameterdescription.para: allocated array of length n_z*n_y*n_x*64 to store the coefficients
3D data to be interpolated
number of data points in the x direction
number of data points in the y direction
number of data points in the z direction
boundary condition for x axis
boundary condition for y axis
boundary condition for z axis
minimum value of the x axis
maximum value of the x axis
minimum value of the y axis
maximum value of the y axis
minimum value of the z axis
maximum value of the z axis

memberdef.argsstring: (interp3D_data *str, real *c, int n_x, int n_y, int n_z, int bc_x, int bc_y, int bc_z, real x_min, real x_max, real y_min, real y_max, real z_min, real z_max)
memberdef.name: interp3Dexpl_init_spline

parameterdescription.para: pointer to spline to be initialized
array where coefficients are stored
number of data points in the x direction
number of data points in the y direction
number of data points in the z direction
boundary condition for x axis
boundary condition for y axis
boundary condition for z axis
minimum value of the x axis
maximum value of the x axis
minimum value of the y axis
maximum value of the y axis
minimum value of the z axis
maximum value of the z axis

memberdef.argsstring: (real *f, interp3D_data *str, real x, real y, real z)
memberdef.name: interp3Dexpl_eval_f

briefdescription.para: Evaluate interpolated value of 3D scalar field.

detaileddescription.para: This function evaluates the interpolated value of a 3D scalar field using tricubic spline interpolation coefficients of the explicit form.

parameterdescription.para: variable in which to place the evaluated value
data struct for data interpolation
x-coordinate
y-coordinate
z-coordinate

simplesect.para: zero on success and one if (x,y,z) point is outside the grid.

memberdef.argsstring: (real *f_df, interp3D_data *str, real x, real y, real z)
memberdef.name: interp3Dexpl_eval_df

briefdescription.para: Evaluate interpolated value of 3D field and 1st and 2nd derivatives.

detaileddescription.para: This function evaluates the interpolated value of a 3D scalar field and its 1st and 2nd derivatives using bicubic spline interpolation coefficients of the explicit form.

The evaluated values are returned in an array with following elements:
f_df[0] = f
f_df[1] = f_x
f_df[2] = f_y
f_df[3] = f_z
f_df[4] = f_xx
f_df[5] = f_yy
f_df[6] = f_zz
f_df[7] = f_xy
f_df[8] = f_xz
f_df[9] = f_yz

parameterdescription.para: array in which to place the evaluated values
data struct for data interpolation
x-coordinate
y-coordinate
z-coordinate

simplesect.para: zero on success and one if (x,y,z) point is outside the grid.

briefdescription.para: Tricubic spline interpolation in explicit form.
